title: FDA Commissioner on New Nutrition Guidelines, Flu Surge
description: FDA Commissioner Dr. Marty Makary discusses the new US dietary guidelines that call for more protein and less processed food. Speaking on "Bloomberg The Close," Dr. Makary also comments on the recent surge in flu cases. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: FDA Commissioner Dr. Marty Makary discusses the new US dietary guidelines that call for more protein and less processed food. Speaking on "Bloomberg The Close," Dr. Makary also comments on the recent surge in flu cases. (Source: Bloomberg)
